Verses: 1 enakku Migundha Dhukkamum Idaividaadha Manavedhanaiyum Undaayirukkiradhu;
2 naan Sollugiradhu Poiyalla, Kiristhuvukkul Unmaiyaich Sollugiren Endru Parisuththa Aavikkul En Manasaatchiyum Enakku Saatchiyaayirukkiradhu.
3 maamsaththinpadi En Inaththaaraagiya En Sagodhararukkup Padhilaaga Naane Kiristhuvaivittu Sabikkappattavanaagavendumendru Virumbuvene.
4 avargal Isravelare; Buththirasuvigaaramum, Magimaiyum, Udanpadikkaigalum, Niyaayappiramaanamum, Dhevaaraadhanaiyum, Vaakkuththaththangalum Avargaludaiyavaigale;
5 pidhaakkal Avargaludaiyavargale; Maamsaththinpadi Kiristhuvum Avargalil Pirandhaare, Ivar Endrendraikkum Sthoththirikkappatta Sarvaththirkummelaana Dhevan. Aamen.
6 dhevavasanam Avamaaip Poyitrendru Sollakkoodaadhu; Enendraal, Isravel Vamsaththaar Ellaarum Isravelarallave.
7 avargal Aabiragaamin Sandhadhiyaaraanaalum Ellaarum Pillaigalallave; Eesaakkinidaththil Un Sandhadhi Vilangumendru Solliyirukkiradhe.
8 adheppadiyendraal, Maamsaththinpadi Pillaigalaanavargal Dhevanudaiya Pillaigalalla, Vaakkuththaththaththinpadi Pillaigalaanavargale Andhach Sandhadhi Endrennappadugiraargal.
9 andha Vaakkuththaththamaana Vaarththaiyaavadhu: Kuriththa Kaalaththile Varuven, Appozhudhu Saaraal Oru Kumaaranaip Peruvaal Enbadhe.
10 idhuvumallaamal, Nammudaiya Pidhaavaagiya Eesaakku Ennum Oruvanaale Rebekkaal Karppavadhiyaanapodhu,

11 pillaigal Innum Piravaamalum, Nalvinai Theevinai Ondrum Seyyaamalumirukkaiyil, Dhevanudaiya Therindhukolludhalinpadiyirukkira Avarudaiya Theermaanam Kiriyaigalinaale Nilainirkaamal Azhaikkiravaraale Nilainirkumpadikku,
12 mooththavan Ilaiyavanukku Oozhiyanjseyvaan Endru Avaludane Sollappattadhu.
13 appadiye, Yaakkobai Sinegiththu, Esaavai Veruththen Endrum Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu.
14 aagaiyaal Naam Enna Solluvom? Dhevanidaththile Aneedhi Undendru Sollalaamaa? Sollakkoodaadhe.
15 avar Moseyai Nokki: Evanmel Irakkamaayirukka Siththamaayiruppeno Avanmel Irakkamaayiruppen, Evanmel Urukkamaayirukka Siththamaayiruppeno Avanmel Urukkamaayiruppen Endraar.
16 aagaiyaal Virumbugiravanaalumalla, Odugiravanaalum Alla, Irangugira Dhevanaaleyaam.

17 melum Ennudaiya Vallamaiyai Unnidaththil Kaanbikkumpadiyaagavum, Ennudaiya Naamam Boomiyil Engum Pirasthaabamaakumpadiyaagavum, Unnai Nilainiruththinen Endru Paarvonudane Sonnadhaaga Vedhaththil Solliyirukkiradhu.
18 aadhalaal Evanmel Irakkamaayirukka Siththamaayirukkiraaro Avanmel Irakkamaayirukkiraar, Evanaik Kadinappaduththa Siththamaayirukkiraaro Avanaik Kadinappaduththugiraar.
19 ippadiyaanaal, Avar Innum En Kutrampidikkiraar? Avar Siththaththirku Edhirththunirpavan Yaar? Endru Ennudane Solluvaai.
20 appadiyaanaal, Manushane, Dhevanodu Edhirththuth Tharkkikkira Nee Yaar? Uruvaakkappatta Vasthu Uruvaakkinavanai Nokki: Nee Ennai En Ippadi Undaakkinaayendru Sollalaamaa?
21 midhiyitta Ore Kalimanninaale Kuyavan Oru Paaththiraththaik Ganamaana Kaariyaththukkum, Oru Paaththiraththaik Ganaveenamaana Kaariyaththukkum Pannugiradharku Manninmel Avanukku Adhigaaram Illaiyo?
22 dhevan Thamadhu Kobaththaik Kaanbikkavum, Thamadhu Vallamaiyaith Therivikkavum,

23 thaam Magimaikkaaga Eththanamaakkina Kirubaapaaththirangalmel Thammudaiya Magimaiyin Aisuvariyaththaith Theriyappaduththavum Siththamaai, Azhivukku Eththanamaakkappatta Kobaakkinaip Paaththirangalmel Migavum Neediya Saandhaththode Porumaiyaayirundhaaraanaal Unakkenna?
24 avar Yoodharilirundhumaaththiramalla, Purajaadhigalilumirundhu Nammai Azhaiththirukkiraare.
25 andhappadi: Enakku Janangalallaadhavargalai Ennudaiya Janangal Endrum, Sinekikkappadaadhirundhavalai Sinekikkappattaval Endrum Solli Azhaippen.
26 neengal Ennudaiya Janangalallavendru Avargalukkuch Sollappatta Idaththile Avargal Jeevanulla Dhevanudaiya Pillaigal Ennappaduvaargal Endru Osiyaavin Theerkkadharisanaththil Solliyirukkiradhu.
27 allaamalum Isravel Buththirarudaiya Ilakkam Samuththiraththin Manalaththanaiyaayirundhaalum, Meedhiyaayiruppavargal Maaththiram Ratchikkappaduvaargalendrum;
28 avar Needhiyode Seekkiramaaith Thammudaiya Kaariyaththai Niraivetruvaar; Karththar Boomiyile Seekkiramaagave Kaariyaththai Niraivetri Mudippaar Endrum Esaayaa Isravelaraikkuriththu Sollugiraan.
29 allaamalum Esaayaa Munne Sonnapadi: Senaigalin Karththar Namakkulle Oru Sandhadhiyai Meedhiyaaga Vaikkaadhirundhaaraanaal Naam Sodhomaippolaagi Komoraavukku Oththiruppom.
30 ippadiyirukka Naam Ennasolluvom? Needhiyaith Thedaadha Purajaadhiyaar Needhiyai Adaindhaargal; Adhu Visuvaasaththinaalaagum Needhiye.
31 needhippiramaanaththaith Thedina Isravelaro Needhippiramaanaththai Adaiyavillai.
32 ennaththinaalendraal, Avargal Visuvaasaththinaale Adhaith Thedaamal, Niyaayappiramaanaththin Kiriyaigalinaale Thedinapadiyaal Adhai Adaiyavillai; Idarudharkaana Kallil Idarinaargal.
33 idho, Idarudharkaana Kallaiyum, Thavarudharkaana Kanmalaiyaiyum, Seeyonil Vaikkiren; Avaridaththil Visuvaasamaayiruppavan Evano Avan Vetkappaduvadhillai Endru Ezhudhiyirukkirapadiyaayitru.
